name: NightBulb Demo Version -- TheMostUniquePinballGameEver
description:
NightBulb-Demo

NightBulb is a pinball game with platformer mechanics. This video is not up to date. For the better experience please watch the video muted. The sound is awful. :( 

It was made with Godot the open source engine. This will be my first commercial game ever,so it has some flaws. I will make a free demo but I have to make a paid version in order to release on Steam or the Play Store (Steam requires 100us$).

My plans are:
  • Make over 30 levels up to 100
  • Make Boss Battles
  • Have a nice UI
  • Improve the video's sound :)
  • Change the fonts
  • Add more mechanics
  • Make Multiplayer mode (That's interesting)
  • Some Themes
  • And whatever you want
  • Make Twitter,and Youtube channel to help you learn GameDev (but it's just a plan)

If you like this game PLS support me and or write a review. if you have something to discuss about this game you can write to hacker01henry@gmail.com or write to the comments below.And don't forget to share it.

Thank you 4 reading and Happy Gamin'!
